name: htbhf-applicant-web-ui
version_notice: Patch versions are incremented by Travis (in tag_version.sh via .travis.yml) - never manually increment the patch version

scripts.start:dev: npm run build && nodemon $NODE_DEBUG_OPTION src/web -e js,json,html,njk
scripts.test: npm-run-all build test:lint test:unit:coverage -p -r start test:browser
scripts.test:acceptance: mkdir -p build/reports && cross-env TESTS=acceptance cucumber-js src/test/acceptance/features/ --require 'src/test/common/steps/*.js' --require 'src/test/acceptance/config' -f json:build/reports/acceptance-report.json
scripts.test:acceptance:debug: mkdir -p build/reports && cross-env TESTS=acceptance node $NODE_DEBUG_OPTION node_modules/cucumber/bin/cucumber-js src/test/acceptance/features/ --require 'src/test/common/steps/*.js' --require 'src/test/acceptance/config' -f json:build/reports/acceptance-report.json
scripts.test:smoke:test: mkdir -p build/reports && cross-env TESTS=smoke cucumber-js src/test/smoke/features/ --require 'src/test/common/steps/*.js' --require 'src/test/smoke/config' -f json:build/reports/smoke-report.json
scripts.test:compatibility:local:test: mkdir -p build/reports/compatibility && cross-env TESTS=localCompatibility cucumber-js src/test/compatibility/features/ --require 'src/test/common/steps/*.js' --require 'src/test/compatibility/config' -f json:build/reports/compatibility-report.json
scripts.test:browser: npm run test:wait && npm-run-all -s test:smoke test:accessibility test:compatibility:local test:acceptance test:acceptance:report
scripts.test:compatibility: mkdir -p build/reports/compatibility && cross-env TESTS=compatibility npm-run-all -c -p --max-parallel 1 compat:win compat:osx compat:mobile
scripts.compat:win: cross-env BROWSER_STACK_OS=Windows BROWSER_STACK_OS_VERSION=10 npm-run-all -c -p --max-parallel 5 compat:win:ie compat:win:edge compat:win:chrome compat:win:firefox
scripts.compat:osx: cross-env BROWSER_STACK_OS='OS X' BROWSER_STACK_OS_VERSION=Mojave npm-run-all -c -p --max-parallel 5 compat:osx:chrome compat:osx:firefox
scripts.compat:ios:iphone: cross-env BROWSER_STACK_DEVICE='iPhone XS' BROWSER_STACK_OS_VERSION=12.1 BROWSER_STACK_BROWSER=iPhone cucumber-js src/test/compatibility/features/ --require 'src/test/common/steps/*.js' --require 'src/test/compatibility/config' --format ./src/test/compatibility/custom-json-formatter.js:build/reports/compatibility/ios-iPhone-report.json
scripts.compat:android:pixel3: cross-env BROWSER_STACK_DEVICE='Google Pixel 3' BROWSER_STACK_OS_VERSION=9.0 BROWSER_STACK_BROWSER=android cucumber-js src/test/compatibility/features/ --require 'src/test/common/steps/*.js' --require 'src/test/compatibility/config' --format ./src/test/compatibility/custom-json-formatter.js:build/reports/compatibility/android-pixel3-report.json
scripts.compat:android:galaxys8: cross-env BROWSER_STACK_DEVICE='Samsung Galaxy S8' BROWSER_STACK_OS_VERSION=7.0 BROWSER_STACK_BROWSER=android cucumber-js src/test/compatibility/features/ --require 'src/test/common/steps/*.js' --require 'src/test/compatibility/config' --format ./src/test/compatibility/custom-json-formatter.js:build/reports/compatibility/android-galaxys8-report.json
